name: Weaver
title: Skitskurr
lore: A creature that exists outside of time, Weaver can unravel and restore the fabric of reality.

theSwarm.name: The Swarm
theSwarm.description: Releases a swarm of beetles that attach to enemies, damaging and reducing armor.

shukuchi.name: Shukuchi
shukuchi.description: Weaver turns invisible and moves at maximum speed, damaging enemies passed.

geminate_attack.name: Geminate Attack
geminate_attack.description: Weaver's attacks occasionally launch a second attack.

timeLapse.name: Time Lapse
timeLapse.description: Weaver warps backward in time, returning to where he was 5 seconds ago with that HP and mana.
